trans-unit.source: Passed to the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext)" /> method to enable the modification of an operation contract and its context prior to generating code.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para modificar el modelo de objetos de documento del código antes de la generación de código.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, la interfaz <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> se implementa en una implementación <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> personalizada utilizada para importar los elementos WSDL personalizados o, de lo contrario, modificar el código en el nivel de servicio o de operación.

trans-unit.source: To modify the code at the service level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar el código en el nivel del servicio, vea <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra el uso del objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para agregar comentarios de código extraídos de los elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios de código resultantes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> class.
The service contract generator that generates the code.
The contract and its generation context.
The operation description for the operation to be generated.
The declaring code type.
The method to be generated.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract context, operation description, code type declaration, synchronization method and task method.
The service contract generator that generates the code.
The contract and its generation context.
The operation description for the operation to be generated.
The declaring code type.
The synchronization method to be generated.
The task method used.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract context, operation description, code type declaration, and method.
The service contract generator that generates the code.
The contract and its generation context.
The operation description for the operation to be generated.
The declaring code type.
The synchronous method.
The asynchronous begin method.
The asynchronous end method.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> class.
The service contract generator that generates the code.
The contract and its generation context.
The operation description for the operation to be generated.
The declaring code type.
The synchronization method to be generated.
The asynchronous begin method.
The asynchronous end method.
The task method used.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract context, operation description, code type declaration, synchronization method, begin method, end method, and task method.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the asynchronous begin operation.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the asynchronous begin operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> para la operación de inicio asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Returns null if the operation is a synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve null si la operación es sincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.BeginMethod%2A> to examine or modify the asynchronous begin method that represents the operation to be generated.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.BeginMethod%2A> para examinar o modificar el método de inicio asincrónico que representa la operación que se va a generar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code generation context for the service contract.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> para la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> property to obtain the contract generation context for the service contract that contains the operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> para obtener el contexto de generación de contrato del contrato de servicio que contiene la operación.

trans-unit.source: Gets the declaring type for the current operation.
The declaring type for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de declaración para la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.DeclaringType%2A> property to examine or modify the code type declaration for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.DeclaringType%2A> para examinar o modificar la declaración de tipos del código para la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the asynchronous end operation declaration.
The asynchronous end operation.
trans-unit.target: Operación de finalización asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Returns null if the operation is a synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve null si la operación es sincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.EndMethod%2A> property to examine or modify the asynchronous end method that models an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.EndMethod%2A> para examinar o modificar el método de finalización asincrónico modelado por una operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether asynchronous methods are generated for the current operation.
<see langword="true" /> if the operation is asynchronous; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la operación es asincrónica; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a task is generated for the current operation.
<see langword="True" /> if a task is generated for the current operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> Si una tarea se genera para la operación actual. en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> for the current operation.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> para la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.Operation%2A> property to examine operation information prior to generating code for that operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.Operation%2A> para examinar información de la operación antes de generar el código de esa operación.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that generates the current operation.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that generates the current operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> que genera la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> property to examine or modify the object that generates code for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> para examinar o modificar el objeto que genera el código de la operación actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the synchronous operation.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> para la operación sincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.SyncMethod%2A> property to examine or modify the synchronous operation before it is generated.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext.SyncMethod%2A> para examinar o modificar la operación sincrónica antes de que se genere.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra el uso del objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para agregar comentarios de código extraídos de los elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios de código resultantes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the task operation.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> for the task operation.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod" /> operación de la tarea.
